info.name: endpoints
info.description:
This is a simple application made with Express and documented with Swagger

Contact Support:
 Name: Mark Zakelj

item.name: Login a user into the system, create a httpOnly cookie in browser

response.name: Login successfull. Return the User OR password is wrong and error message is returned
Some server error

item.name: Logout user from the system, delete the httpOnly cookie in browser

response.name: Logout successfull. Return OK. If user not logged in, also return this code, as the final state in the backend is the same.
Some server error

item.name: Check if the current user is authenticated (has a valid cookie)

response.name: User is authenticated. Return OK
User not logged in. Return Unauthorized

item.name: Update any (or multiple) fields in the project

response.name: Update successful
Project with specified id does not exist
Delete successful
Project with specified id does not exist
Single object returned successfully
Project with specified id does not exist

item.name: Get all users of project with id

response.name: Return all a list of all users on a project
Return all a list of all projects
The created Project.
Project with specified name already exists.
Some server error
User successfully removed

item.name: Update any (or multiple) fields in the user with specified id

response.name: Update successful
User with specified id does not exist or email already exists (when updating mail)
Delete successful
User with specified id does not exist
Single object returned successfully
User with specified id does not exist

item.name: Update any (or multiple) fields in the project

response.name: Update successfull
Invalid old password or new password not valid (too short)

item.name: Get all projects of user with id

response.name: Return all a list of all projects of a user
Return all a list of all users
User created. Return the created User, but without password (obviously).
User with specified email already exists.
Some server error

item.name: Add user to a project with specified project role

response.name: User added to the project. Return the UserOnProject resource.
User with specified id already part of the project
Some server error

item.name: Respond if the app is running normally

request.description: Respond if the app is running normally

response.name: Healthy
